translation: The turbulent senses, O Arjuna, can violently carry away the mind of a wise person, even though they are striving to control them.
commentary: 2.60 striving of the striving? Hi indeed? Even even? Kaunteya O Kaunteya (son of Kunti)? of man of man? wise (of the) wise? The senses the senses? Pramathini turbulent? Take away carry away? forcefully violently? Manah the mind.Commentary The aspirant should first bring the senses under his control. The senses are like horses. If you keep the horses under your perfect control you can reach your destination
